Bounds on variables: 
r1 (Integer) in [0, 511]
x (Real) in [0, 802]

exact NVC: 
((-1 * 500000001) * (1 / 1000000000)) <= (((x / 13176795 / 8388608) + (-1 * r1)) + 542101 / 2500000000000000000000000)

(((x / 13176795 / 8388608) + (-1 * r1)) - 542101 / 2500000000000000000000000) <= (500000001 * (1 / 1000000000))

NOT
  (((((x - (r1 * 25735 / 16384)) - (r1 * 3797 / 67108864)) - (r1 * 17453 / 17592186044416)) - (r1 * 12727493 / 2361183241434822606848)) + 1765573 / 10000000000) <= 6851933 / 8388608
